rComments: Nick Koudas is a bad human being. See the other review that's posted. He is a man who lacks empathy and runs his classes like a programmed robot. Easily one of the worst profs I have encountered due to his complete lack of social skills and his vindictive nature, I would advise against taking a class with him. Avoid at all costs.
Terrible human being. One of the worst people I've encountered in my time. How this man is the field of education is beyond comprehension. His accent is thick and he is boring to the core. Avoid
